CustomField.formula: IF( AND( LOWER(Opportunity__r.Account.Sales_Channel__r.Segment_Name__c) = LOWER('FED'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.Primary_Product_Delivery_Address_Country__c, 'UNITED STATES' ), ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.Primary_Product_Delivery_Address_Country__c, 'CANADA' ) ) ), 'TRUE', 'FALSE')
CustomField.label: CommVault Federal Formula
